meta.title: Golden Retriever vs Labrador: Which Family Dog is Best?
meta.description: Comparing America's top two dogs. Golden Retriever vs Labrador Retriever: differences in shedding, energy, trainability, and family suitability.

comparison_points.title: Energy Level
comparison_points.verdict: Labs tend to be slightly more energetic and boisterous than Goldens.

comparison_points.title: Grooming Needs
comparison_points.verdict: Goldens require more brushing to prevent mats; Labs shed more short hairs.

comparison_points.title: Trainability
comparison_points.verdict: Both are eager to please, but Goldens are often softer, while Labs are more food-motivated.
